title: Fix duplicate WhatsApp icon and center Get Directions button label in Footer Quick Actions

requirements.text: Remove the duplicate WhatsApp icon in the Footer "Quick Actions" WhatsApp button so only a single WhatsApp icon is rendered next to the label.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Footer Quick Actions section, the "Book via WhatsApp" button displays exactly one WhatsApp icon (not two).
The fix is implemented without adding any new image assets (use existing icon components only).
Other WhatsApp CTAs on the site (e.g., hero CTA, floating WhatsApp button) still render correctly and are not missing their intended icon.

requirements.text: Ensure the Footer "Quick Actions" "Get Directions" button content (icon + text) is horizontally centered within the full-width button at all screen sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Footer Quick Actions section, the "Get Directions" button label is visually centered horizontally within the full-width button, including when an icon is present.
Button centering remains correct across common breakpoints (mobile and desktop) without changing the click behavior (still opens Google Maps in a new tab).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Keep the existing routes/navigation behavior unchanged.
Do not introduce any new photographic assets; continue using only the existing provided photos for photography.
nonGoals: Diagnosing or fixing deployment/build pipeline errors (no deployment error logs were provided in the request).
Changing WhatsApp phone number, message content, or Google Maps destination behavior beyond alignment/icon rendering fixes.
